section.title: wifi_init_ap_sta()

para.para: Initializes Wi-Fi in both Access Point (AP) and Station (STA) modes.

section.para: Initializes the Wi-Fi in AP+STA mode.

This function initializes the Wi-Fi stack, configures the Wi-Fi interfaces, and starts the Wi-Fi service. It also registers event handlers for Wi-Fi and IP events, and connects to a Wi-Fi network in STA mode, if configured.

note.title: Note
note.para: This function configures the ESP32 in dual mode (AP and STA) and connects to a Wi-Fi network if WIFI_CONNECT is defined.
